mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SAVECAL( calc_id, material_no, material_volume, confirm_yn )VALUES( #{calcId}, #{materialNo}, #{materialVolume}, #{confirmYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT calc_id, material_no, material_volume, confirm_yn FROM SAVECAL WHERE 1=1 AND calc_id = #{calcId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SAVECAL SET CONFIRM_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND CALC_ID = #{calcId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.material_volume, b.material_img, b.material_name FROM SAVECAL a INNER JOIN Materials b ON a.material_no = b.material_no WHERE calc_id = #{calcId}
